alert.note: Alert for Simcoe Highlands (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 16 at 1:29PM PDT by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Klickitat County through 145 PM PDT... At 128 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over southwestern Yakama Reservation, or 17 miles north of Goldendale. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Southern Yakama Reservation. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
